reviews.customers_say: Customers find the coat beautiful and appreciate its high quality.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful ordered two sizes up
items.body: This top is soft and gorgeous. It is too small though. It runs small and I think two sizes too small. I ordered up and it definitely did not fit especially in the chest area. I wished it fit. Also it is more like a pull over. That top button does not unbutton making trying it on and removing awkward. Read more
items.author: Mlau

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very high quality and beautiful
items.body: High quality fitted jacket. Perfect winter white color. As stated in other reviews, it's best to order a size or two up. I normally wear a size 12-14, I ordered an XX-large and it just fits. It looks tailored, which is exactly what I was looking for. I'm planning on wearing it paired with dress pants or satin skirts. The wool is soft and warm, the jacket is lined and comfortable on. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Size up one
items.body: This is nice, size up one size. The shipping took for ever. So you may not get it in time , Read more
items.author: BMS

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not true to size
items.body: Extremely small around the chest. I loved the design and material, but I couldn’t even get it around my chest after sizing up. Read more
items.author: Judy

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fitting and equality!
items.body: Runs small , Disappointed!!! Beautiful The medium , wii be too bid in the shoulders and sleeve length! 1 thought maybe ‘‘tis would work but I need a petite! Read more
items.author: John Frey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits to size
items.body: Love it. Fits great, great price Read more
items.author: Heidi H.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well designed and well made. Sizing a bit off.
items.body: I really love this sweater. This is a beautiful sweater, well made, and wonderfully designed. It fit well in my shoulders and arms, but was too tight around my stomach. I'm hoping if I lose a few pounds that it'll fit better, but worry it will be too large in the areas that it does fit. Maybe, I don't have the right figure for the design? Read more
items.author: Mary P

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Classic
items.body: This item runs, extremely small. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth C.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
